subject: Re: My peanut club
author: Kimberly
full_text:
That's awesome!

Kim




--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, SnowfireL@... wrote:
>
> Something funny, I was taking a break for doing house work that rarely
gets
> down, but my new bosses on the Radio (box) aka the brownie gallery or
the
> peanut club, say, "clean up, clean up" and when I came into my room,
> leaving them to chat amoung themselves, i heard some fella say, "now
what's she
> up to?" It's like having a lot of guests without having to feed them,
lol
> love them all dearly, i so happy i found out about all of you, last i
heard
> of this was long ago, that was a mr meek, i never thought this would
> happen in my day, this world doesn't know what it's missing. Have a
Happy day
> everyone, sf
